channel.title: The Random Picture Thread
channel.description:
Use this thread to post images of any kind, as long as they are safe for work and not offensive in any way.
I'm taking the liberty of posting some rules but the admins/moderators are free to change/expand the rules as they see fit.
[font=Impact][color=Red]RULES FOR THIS THREAD[/SIZE][/font]
a) You may post a maximum of 3 pictures per post.
b) You may only post again after 5 posts from other members.[/SIZE]
c) The content of the pictures has to fall in line with the rules of these forums, so do not post anything that might be considered offensive and/or inappropriate such as porn, gore, violence, insults against other members/religions/genders/race/nationality/etc. Basically, don't be a dick.[/SIZE]
d) Try to not hotlink pictures. Use image hosts such as [/SIZE] [url='https://www.imgur.com']www.imgur.com[/url] or [url='https://www.dropbox.com']www.dropbox.com[/url] or simply use the file attachement feature from these forums.
e) Try to keep unnecessary chit-chat to a minimum. This thread is for posting pictures.
f) Have fun![/SIZE]

item.title: The Random Picture Thread
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Use this thread to post images of any kind, as long as they are safe for work and not offensive in any way.

I’m taking the liberty of posting some rules but the admins/moderators are free to change/expand the rules as they see fit.

[color=Red]RULES FOR THIS THREAD[/SIZE]

a) You may post a maximum of 3 pictures per post.

b) You may only post again after 5 posts from other members.[/SIZE]

c) The content of the pictures has to fall in line with the rules of these forums, so do not post anything that might be considered offensive and/or inappropriate such as porn, gore, violence, insults against other members/religions/genders/race/nationality/etc. Basically, don’t be a dick.[/SIZE]

d) Try to not hotlink pictures. Use image hosts such as [/SIZE] www.imgur.com or www.dropbox.com or simply use the file attachement feature from these forums.

e) Try to keep unnecessary chit-chat to a minimum. This thread is for posting pictures.

f) Have fun![/SIZE]
